title: Agent.Register.Input
description: Profile-aware input for the Agent.Register capability.

profile.description: Optional reference to the subject/org profile to load.

profilePatch.description: Optional modifications to apply to the loaded profile.

identifier_ref.description: Opaque reference to the agent being registered.

subscriber_ref.description: Reference to the subscriber associated with the agent.

org_ref.description: Reference to the organization associated with the agent.

log_refs.description: Log references relevant to the registration decision.
